data.title: Rhino's Revenge
data.text:
Just Sayin'

Released on March 1, Rhino's new album, 'Just Sayin'', is now available to order exclusively from the the Rhino Store

The album is available in two physical formats:

- A 14 track digipak CD - a limited edition of 1,000 copies, each sequentially hand-numbered (but not autographed) and including a 16-page booklet. The CD features two tracks not on the vinyl versions.

- A 12 track 140gm black vinyl 12" album - a limited edition of just 250 copies, each sequentially hand-numbered and autographed by Rhino - and including a one-page insert.

Rhino's Revenge Live at The Half Moon

We're delighted to announce that RR will return to the The Half Moon Putney for another matinee show on Sunday, October 27. Aside from the band's gigs in Barnoldswick earlier that month, the London gig is likely to be the only other RR live performance in 2024, so don't delay, get your tickets now at https://bit.ly/4bHi9Mg

VIP tickets for the show are available exclusively by sending a message to info@molanomusic.com If you have already bought general admission tickets and would like to upgrade to VIP, write to the same address. The VIP package will include admission, a meet and greet with Rhino's Revenge, access to the band's sound check, a memento laminate and lanyard and a voucher offering a 20% discount on anything - other than CDs and vinyl records - bought from the merchandise stand. Please note that VIP packages cannot be purchased directly from ticket platforms.
